entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 17. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h after midnight. Low minus 17. Wind chill minus 27 overnight. Forecast issued 12:26 AM MST Monday 06 March 2023

entry.title: Monday: Light snow. High minus 5.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries early in the morning. Light snow beginning in the morning. Amount 2 cm. Wind east 20 km/h. High minus 5. Wind chill minus 25 in the morning and minus 12 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 12:26 AM MST Monday 06 March 2023
